info.game_comments: 2005 Ultimate Tournament of Champions Round 1, game 5.

(1, 1).clue: An ad reading "Folk & Roll musicians singers for acting roles in new TV series" helped form this '60s band

(2, 1).clue: Known as "the Father of Pennsylvania", he also fathered 8 children

(3, 1).clue: Kansas is the heartland--this point for the lower 48 states is even located near the town of Lebanon

(4, 1).clue: Interest in diamonds in this color soared when Ben gave Jen a big one set in her engagement ring

(6, 1).clue: It might dawn on you that it's the 11th sign of the zodiac

(1, 2).clue: "Are we not men?  We are" this New Wave group that gave us "Whip It"

(6, 3).clue: 8-letter term that's almost impossible to believe; why, it's "absolutely"...

(6, 4).clue: From the French for "to compose", its a wandering medieval singer

(2, 5).clue: St. Ambrose credits this mother of Constantine with finding the true cross of Jesus

(5, 5).clue: Her Oct. 7, 1914 wedding day would prove to be a focal point of American politics
